amendment.description: Amendment sought to postpone the bill from going into effect until the DOI, in consultation with DOL, certifies that the offshore energy moratorium in the bill would not eliminate a substantial number of minority and women jobs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to allow the bill to go into effect when DOI, in consultation with DOL, certifies that the offshore energy moratorium in the bill will not eliminate a substantial number of minority and women jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 252 (Roll no. 523).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 252 (Roll no. 523).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Gosar.
